scripts.setup: npm i && rm -fr dist && tsc && pegjs -o dist/main/parser.js src/main/parser.pegjs
scripts.make: rm -fr dist && tsc && pegjs -o dist/main/parser.js src/main/parser.pegjs
scripts.start:
nodemon --watch src --watch package.json -e ts,json,pegjs -q -x 'rm -fr dist && echo "
============
COMPILING...
============

" && tsc --outDir dist || return 0 && pegjs -o dist/main/parser.js src/main/parser.pegjs || return 0 && node dist/main/cli.js'
scripts.testdev:
nodemon --watch src --watch package.json -e ts,json,pegjs -q -x 'rm -fr dist && echo "
============
COMPILING...
============

" && tsc --outDir dist || return 0 && pegjs -o dist/main/parser.js src/main/parser.pegjs || return 0 && tape "dist/tests/**/*.js"'
